title: Warm Waters - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Cohabitation   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Early Romance   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Short Story   Unrequited Love   Younger Love Interests
author: 景生京月
description:
“You bought a pair of shoes worth 3,000 yuan for Xia Jinian.

Are you that rich?

Yet, on weekdays, you wouldn’t even agree to go eat hot pot with me!“

After three years of living together, his lover’s white moonlight* came back.

While the warm water kept boiling, the frog jumped out of the pot.

I am done waiting, I will not continue to serve you this little ancestor!

* First Love>
